_: this is a comment field and is only used to enable commenting inside this file

public._: Enables error selection in TestData exchange
Enables an additional view for development
Enables an additional AccessCode field in register view

private._: The AccessCode that is requiered by the AccessCode field
Activates the periodic update function that updates the available trading pairs from each exchange (once every day)
Sets log level (ascending order: debug, verbose, info, error)
